Package org.gvsig.app.project.documents.view.toolListeners

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InfoListener.InfoByPointRenderer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AngleGeometryListener  
    AreaListener
    Listener for calculating the area of a polygon, defined in the associated MapControl object.
    CircleMeasureListener
    Listener for tools that measure using a circular area, displaying its radius at the status bar of the application's main frame.
    IdentifyLayerListener  
    InfoListener
    Listener that looks for information at the point selected by one click of any mouse's button, in the active layers of the associated MapControl, and displays that data on a FInfoDialog dialog.
    InfoListener.DefaultInfoByPointRenderer  
    MapOverviewChangeZoomListener
    Listener for changes of the zoom caused by selecting a rectangular area on the associated MapOverview object with the first button of the mouse.
    MapOverviewListener
    Listener for changes of the zoom caused by selecting a point on the associated MapOverview object by a single click of the button 1 of the mouse.
    MapOverviewPanListener
    Listener for moving the extent of the associated MapOverview object according the movement between the initial and final points of line determined by the movement dragging with the third button of the mouse.
    MeasureListener
    Listener for calculating distances using vertexes of a polyline, defined in the associated MapControl object, and displaying that information at the status bar of the application's main frame.
    PanListener
    Inherits PanListener enabling/disabling special controls for managing the data.
    PointSelectListener
    Inherits PointSelectListener enabling/disabling special controls for managing the data selected.
    PolygonSelectListener
    Inherits PolygonSelectionListener enabling/disabling special controls for managing the data selected.
    RectangleSelectListener
    Inherits RectangleSelectionListener enabling/disabling special controls for managing the data selected.
    StatusBarListener
    Listener that displays at the status bar of the application's main frame, the value of the point coordinates of the mouse's cursor on the associated MapControl, just as is received a PointEvent event.
    ZoomInListener
    Inherits ZoomInListenerImpl enabling/disabling special controls for managing the data selected.
    ZoomOutListener
    Inherits ZoomOutListenerImpl enabling/disabling special controls for managing the data selected.
